release.description: Alfresco 4.x compatible release and major internal refactoring
release.action: Compatible and tested with Alfresco 4.2 Enterprise
Introduced disk speed check for indexes disk
Update License and document transitive dependencies licenses in Maven Site
Review port numbers described at http://wiki.alfresco.com/wiki/Port_numbers, and ensure EVT is checking all of them.
package.sh as to be removed
The speed check messaging could be improved.
Index speed check UI inconsistencies.
Externalized all validation properties in properties files to increase maintainability
Removed obsolete Alfresco links
Invalid parameter values should be cleanly detected and rejected
